accordions.title: Ingredients
accordions.content:
Our carefully selected blend of premium ingredients supports your body's natural processes:

  • Ashwagandha Extract (600mg) - Adaptogen for stress management
  • Vitamin D3 (2000 IU) - Immune support and bone health
  • Omega-3 Fish Oil (1000mg) - Heart and brain health
  • Probiotics (10 Billion CFU) - Gut health and digestion
  • B-Complex Vitamins - Energy metabolism support
  • Magnesium Glycinate (400mg) - Muscle relaxation and sleep

accordions.title: Third-Party Tested
accordions.content:
Every batch of Daily Ultimate Essentials undergoes rigorous third-party testing to ensure:

  • Purity - Free from heavy metals, pesticides, and contaminants
  • Potency - Verified ingredient amounts match label claims
  • Quality - Manufactured in NSF-certified facilities
  • Safety - Tested for allergens and microbiological contamination

All test results are available upon request. Contact our customer service team for certificates of analysis.

accordions.title: How to Enjoy
accordions.content:
Recommended Usage:

Take 1 scoop (12g) daily mixed with 8-12 oz of cold water or your favorite beverage. For best results, take in the morning with or without food.

Pro Tips:

  • Blend with smoothies for a nutritious breakfast boost
  • Mix with plant-based milk for a creamier texture
  • Add to overnight oats for sustained energy
  • Shake vigorously in a bottle for quick preparation

accordions.title: Tasting Notes
accordions.content:
Flavor Profile: Subtle berry blend with natural sweetness

Texture: Smooth and easily mixable, no grittiness

Sweetness Level: Lightly sweetened with stevia and monk fruit

No artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives. Naturally flavored with real fruit extracts.
